```{r}
#| label: ggdag
#| eval: false

source("ggdag-theme.R")

dag %>%
  tidy_dagitty() %>%
  node_status() %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(x, y, xend = xend, yend = yend, color = status)
  ) +
  geom_dag_edges() +
  geom_dag_point() +
  geom_dag_label_repel() +
  scale_color_okabe_ito(na.value = "grey90") +
  theme_dag() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off")
```
